products.title: HUBA BASIC T-SHIRT V2
products.description: The HUBA Basic T-shirt is designed for ultimate comfort and everyday wear. Made from premium double yarn 100% cotton fabric, this 235 GSM tee offers a boxy fit, providing a relaxed yet stylish look. Its breathable fabric ensures all-day comfort, making it a wardrobe essential. The minimal screen-printed HUBA logo on the chest adds a subtle touch of branding.

products.title: HUBA Waffle Hoodie -Brown
products.description: Stay cozy and stylish with our HUBA Waffle Hoodie, crafted from soft, eco-friendly waffle fabric for maximum comfort. This hoodie is designed for everyday wear, offering a perfect blend of warmth and breathability. Its classic fit allows you to effortlessly dress it up or keep it casual, making it a versatile wardrobe staple.

products.title: Titan Quartz Analog Black
products.description: A Titan Analog Watch is a stylish and elegant timepiece known for its precision, durability, and timeless design. Featuring a classic analog display with hour, minute, and second hands, Titan watches are crafted with high-quality materials like stainless steel, leather, and scratch-resistant glass.

products.title: Samba OG Shoes
products.description: If you time travelled back to the 1960s, you'd find pro soccer players wearing adidas Sambas just like these kids' shoes.

products.title: Newmew Round Transparent Grey Black Sunglass
products.description: a stylish and functional eyewear piece that elevates your fashion while offering optimal eye protection. The sunglasses feature a durable polycarbonate frame, ensuring a lightweight and sturdy build. The temple material, crafted from TR (thermoplastic rubber), enhances flexibility and comfort during extended wear. The round frame shape adds a classic and timeless touch to your overall look, making it a versatile accessory for various occasions.
